_header: As I lay upon a night
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 188.
_description: A carol of the Annunciation — five quatrains (aaab) including refrain, ‘Redemptoris mater’ plus burden (bb): ‘Now syng we all in fere / Alma redemptoris mater’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
As y lay vp on a nyȝtmy þouȝt y say a semly
                    syȝt…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…And with hym þat swete wyȝtRedemptoris
                    mater

OxfBal354.First Lines:
As I me lay on a nyghtMe thowght I sawe a semly syght
                    wyght…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Tyll after she sawe hym ryse vprightAlma Redemptoris
                        materExplicit

CamTCC1230.First Lines:
As I lay vp on a nythMy yowth was on a berde so
                    brith…
CamTCC1230.Last Lines:
…Wyth þat berd þat is so brithRedemptoris
                        mater
